name: Diced Up!
description:
Enter the Gungeon inspired shooter where your stats are randomly selected at the start of a new wave.

Original version made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Unlock new weapons by getting to Floors 5, 10, and 20

You get more dice rolls by beating every third round (MAX 6 DICE)

CONTROLS

WASD and ARROW KEYS for movement

SPACE or SHIFT to dash

SPACE or ENTER to select, ESCAPE to go back
